name: Humanitix
description: Humanitix integration for managing events, orders, tickets, and tags

api_key.label: API Key
api_key.help_text: Your Humanitix API Key. Generate it from Account > Advanced > API Key in the Humanitix Host Console.

get_events.description: Retrieve events from your Humanitix account. Fetch a single event by ID, or list all events. Returns event details including name, dates, venue, and ticket information.

event_id.description: Optional: Specific event ID to retrieve. If provided, fetches that single event directly and the page_size, since, and page parameters are ignored. If omitted, returns a paginated list of events.

override_location.description: Override the user location for the query. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. 'AU', 'NZ', 'US'). Applies to both single event and list queries.

page_size.description: Page size of results (1-100, default 100). Only used when listing events (ignored if event_id is provided).

since.description: Return events since this date-time (ISO 8601, e.g. '2021-02-01T23:26:13.485Z'). Only used when listing events (ignored if event_id is provided).

page.description: Page number to fetch (starts at 1). Only used when listing events (ignored if event_id is provided).

events.description: List of events (single item if event_id specified)

get_orders.description: Retrieve orders for a specific event. Returns order details including buyer information, ticket quantities, and payment status.

event_id.description: The event ID to get orders for.

order_id.description: Optional: Specific order ID to retrieve. If provided, fetches that single order directly and the page_size, since, and page parameters are ignored. If omitted, returns a paginated list of orders.

override_location.description: Override the user location for the query. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. 'AU', 'NZ', 'US'). Applies to both single order and list queries.

event_date_id.description: Optional: Filter by a specific event date ID. Applies to both single order and list queries.

page_size.description: Page size of results (1-100, default 100). Only used when listing orders (ignored if order_id is provided).

since.description: Return orders since this date-time (ISO 8601, e.g. '2021-02-01T23:26:13.485Z'). Only used when listing orders (ignored if order_id is provided).

page.description: Page number to fetch (starts at 1). Only used when listing orders (ignored if order_id is provided).

orders.description: List of orders (single item if order_id specified)

get_tickets.description: Retrieve tickets for a specific event. Returns ticket details including attendee information, ticket type, and check-in status.

event_id.description: The event ID to get tickets for.

ticket_id.description: Optional: Specific ticket ID to retrieve. If provided, fetches that single ticket directly and the page_size, since, status, event_date_id, and page parameters are ignored. If omitted, returns a paginated list of tickets.

override_location.description: Override the user location for the query. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. 'AU', 'NZ', 'US'). Applies to both single ticket and list queries.

event_date_id.description: Optional: Filter by a specific event date ID. Only used when listing tickets (ignored if ticket_id is provided).

page_size.description: Page size of results (1-100, default 100). Only used when listing tickets (ignored if ticket_id is provided).

since.description: Return tickets since this date-time (ISO 8601, e.g. '2021-02-01T23:26:13.485Z'). Only used when listing tickets (ignored if ticket_id is provided).

status.description: Filter by ticket status ('complete' or 'cancelled'). Only used when listing tickets (ignored if ticket_id is provided).

page.description: Page number to fetch (starts at 1). Only used when listing tickets (ignored if ticket_id is provided).

tickets.description: List of tickets (single item if ticket_id specified)

checked_in.description: Whether ticket has been checked in

get_tags.description: Retrieve all tags from your Humanitix account. Tags are used to categorize and filter events.

tag_id.description: Optional: Specific tag ID to retrieve. If provided, fetches that single tag directly and the page_size and page parameters are ignored. If omitted, returns a paginated list of tags.

page_size.description: Page size of results (1-100, default 100). Only used when listing tags (ignored if tag_id is provided).

page.description: Page number to fetch (starts at 1). Only used when listing tags (ignored if tag_id is provided).

check_in.description: Check in a ticket for an event. Marks the attendee as checked in and returns any scanning messages configured for the ticket.

event_id.description: The event ID the ticket belongs to.

ticket_id.description: The ticket ID to check in.

override_location.description: Override the user location for the query. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. 'AU', 'NZ', 'US').

scanning_messages.description: Scanning messages configured for the ticket

check_out.description: Check out a ticket for an event. Marks the attendee as checked out and returns any scanning messages configured for the ticket.

event_id.description: The event ID the ticket belongs to.

ticket_id.description: The ticket ID to check out.

override_location.description: Override the user location for the query. ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. 'AU', 'NZ', 'US').

scanning_messages.description: Scanning messages configured for the ticket
